layout.backendOfflineMessage: The system cannot connect to the server. Please try again later.
layout.backendOfflineNote: The page will automatically update when the connection is restored.
layout.systemUnavailableMessage: We currently cannot connect to the server. Please try again in a moment.

home.intro: On this page you can book tickets. Remember that registration is only complete when both booking and payment are received. Doors open 15 minutes before concert start. See you there!
home.selectTimeSecure: Choose your time and secure your seat now!
home.step4: Click on the payment link to pay
home.reservationNote: You have reserved a seat only when you BOTH have reserved a ticket here on the website - and paid. Click on the link below to pay.
home.lostTicketsOrBooking: Have you lost your tickets or need to return to your booking?

booking.addToCart: Add your tickets to the cart, go to the cart and complete payment
booking.gdprConsent: I consent that this information is saved for verification and deleted at the latest 1 month after the concert by Klasskonsertgruppen
booking.paymentReminder: NOTE! You have reserved a seat only when you BOTH have reserved a ticket here on the website - and paid. Click on the link below to pay.

bookingSuccess.saveReference: Save this reference! You need it to confirm your payment.
bookingSuccess.paymentConfirmed: Thank you! We have received your confirmation. The administrator will check the payment.
bookingSuccess.scanQR: Scan the QR code with the Swish app
bookingSuccess.orPayManually: or pay manually to the number above
bookingSuccess.confirmPayment: Click here when you have paid with Swish

contact.title: Contact us
contact.gdprConsent: I consent that my information is saved and used to respond to my message
contact.thanks: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.phoneContact: Phone: Contact us via email for phone number

lostTickets.title: Lost tickets?
lostTickets.description: Have you lost your tickets? Enter your email address and we will send them to you again.
lostTickets.info: We will send your tickets to the email address you provided when making the booking.

findBooking.title: Find my booking
findBooking.description: Enter your email address and last name to find your booking.
findBooking.info: We use this information to find your booking in our system.
